local_intent: Re-localize and align to the T-block, set 45° yaw, push it 0.1 m along the 45° diagonal, then re-detect and re-align.
assumptions: Maintain diagonal push orientation set to 45° for this cycle.
coherence_with_global: Implements one transfer-cycle consistent with GLOBAL_BT: detect → align → set yaw 45 → push(distance=0.1, direction=45) → re-detect → re-align.
